articles.title: End of the Year Means Another Contrived College Football Playoff
articles.description: A reawakened fan loves the regular season, but says the playoff is more arbitrary invitational than actual tournament.
articles.content: Websites currently chart the top prospects in a variety of sports for the college freshman class of 2028 in other words, an exercise in the inflation of 10-year-old egos, inspiring too many wishful parents eager to spend huge sums on a statistically improbabl… [+2031 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Georgia Tech Tops Hawaii for 3rd at Diamond Head Classic - The New York Times
articles.description: Michael Devoe scored 18 points and Moses Wright added 16 to help Georgia Tech rally past Hawaii 70-53 for third place in the Diamond Head Classic Wednesday.
articles.content:
Hawaii shot just 1 of 15 on 3-pointers in the loss (6.7%), which came two days after it went 9 of 39 from beyond the arc in a 72-61 loss to No. 21 Washington. 
I thought we played a good first half and started the second half the right way. We were up nine a… [+1527 chars]

articles.title: NYT: For Trump Organization, Office Skyscrapers Make Up for Lagging Hotels...
articles.description: It is happy hour at Trump National Doral Miami, the sprawling resort that is the biggest cash generator in President Trump’s business portfolio. But on a weekday evening in November, only a few sprinklings of patrons grace the resort’s bar and high-end steak …
articles.content: But 1,300 miles up the coast, a bustling 43-story officer tower on Sixth Avenue in Midtown Manhattan tells a more nuanced story about the state of the Trump Organization.The building, partially owned by Mr. Trump, does not carry his name, draws no protesters … [+10762 chars]

articles.author: Anna Momigliano
articles.title: He Vowed to Revitalize Italy’s Schools. After a Budget Loss, He’s Out.
articles.description: Education Minister Lorenzo Fioramonti promised to raise performance and introduce lessons on climate change, but Parliament’s budget left him a billion euros short.
articles.content:
ROME Italys education minister, who had vowed to revitalize the countrys schools and introduce lessons on climate change in every grade nationwide, has resigned, citing a lack of funding.
The minister, Lorenzo Fioramonti, submitted his resignation on Monday … [+723 chars]

articles.title: Why Stephen Curry (Not LeBron) Is the N.B.A. Player of the Decade
articles.description: It had to be one or the other. But as great as LeBron James has been, Curry had the edge in one major way: He changed the game.
articles.content:
Victor Mather
Senior staff editor and reporter

articles.title: Did de Blasio Put Politics Ahead of Yeshiva Students?
articles.description: New York City stalled the release of a report critical of the schools as the mayor sought the political support of Orthodox Jewish leaders, city investigators found.
